CPR.global.generic.title: Title
CPR.global.itemType.skill.accountingTool: 管理企业的经济和财务事务，这可能意味着维护账簿、识别假账或自己做假账
CPR.global.itemType.skill.actingToolTip: 投射情绪和心情，假装自己是某事或某人
CPR.global.itemType.skill.animalHandling: 接近、支持、训练和照顾动物。还包括维护它们的信任。
CPR.global.itemType.skill.archeryToolTip: 用弓和弓形武器射击事物的表现如何
CPR.global.itemType.skill.athleticsToolT: 力量、耐力和平衡性；在竞技体育和运动中可能会做的事
CPR.global.itemType.skill.athleticsAndCo: 精灵神域技能，细节参见运动或柔韧技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.autofireToolTi: 全自动开火时保持瞄准目标的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.basicTechToolT: 维护和修理其他技能未涵盖的简单电子设备和其他设备
CPR.global.itemType.skill.basicTechAndWe: 精灵神域技能。细节参见基础技术或武器技术技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.brawlingToolTi: 知道摔跤和武术的诀窍
CPR.global.itemType.skill.briberyToolTip: 辨别如何贿赂某人以及贿赂应是什么
CPR.global.itemType.skill.bureaucracyToo: 了解集体的复杂规则的系统，以获得你所需要的东西，即突破繁文缛节、应用官僚主义、或用官僚制来制约人
CPR.global.itemType.skill.businessToolTi: 了解如何经营企业：最佳做法、合法性、组织和其他事项
CPR.global.itemType.skill.compositionToo: 与创作歌曲和书面作品有关的艺术性技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.compositionAnd: 精灵神域技能。细节参见写作或教育
CPR.global.itemType.skill.concealOrRevea: 隐藏和寻找隐藏的物品，如暗藏的武器
CPR.global.itemType.skill.concentrationT: 在压力下保持集中、控制力、进行其他脑力劳动的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.contortionistT: 扭转和转动身体，摆脱袖口或绳索等捆绑物
CPR.global.itemType.skill.conversationTo: 有效引导演讲主题，从他人那里获得所需信息的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.criminologyToo: 与寻找证据、线索、法医分析、审查警方记录有关的调查技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.danceToolTip: 有节奏地摆动身体，表达自己的想法、情感，或仅仅是为了愉悦身心
CPR.global.itemType.skill.deductionToolT: 横向考虑了几个不同的数据点，并反直觉地总结出准确的结论
CPR.global.itemType.skill.demolitionsToo: 使用适量的爆炸物来实现目标，或辨别如何防止爆炸物
CPR.global.itemType.skill.driveLandVehic: 操纵汽车、公共汽车、卡车、四驱车、自行车、装甲运兵车、坦克......你懂的
CPR.global.itemType.skill.educationToolT: 对学校科目的一般知识和了解
CPR.global.itemType.skill.electronicsAnd: 维护和修理复杂的电子设备，例如计算机、代理人、赛博碟板
CPR.global.itemType.skill.enduranceToolT: 度过恶劣的环境条件，或在饥饿、脱水、窒息或其他生理条件下坚持下来
CPR.global.itemType.skill.enduranceAndRe: 忍耐 / 折磨/药物抵抗
精灵神域技能。细节参见忍耐或折磨/药物抵抗技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.firstAidToolTi: 治疗常见的危重伤病，并对伤员进行治疗
CPR.global.itemType.skill.forgeryToolTip: 验证作品的真实性，或者知道如何欺骗他人
CPR.global.itemType.skill.gambleToolTip: 在机率游戏中善于运用数学和逻辑来提高胜算
CPR.global.itemType.skill.handgunToolTip: 使用手枪等手持武器的准确性和精度
CPR.global.itemType.skill.heavyWeaponsTo: 使用更大的双手武器的准确性和精度
CPR.global.itemType.skill.humanPerceptio: 理解他人对听闻谎言、真相和精神状态时的反应和意向
CPR.global.itemType.skill.interrogationT: 采用技巧来迫使他人放弃他们想要保留的知识，例如秘密
CPR.global.itemType.skill.landVehicleTec: 维护和修理在陆地上行驶而无需飞行的车辆
CPR.global.itemType.skill.languageStreet: 使用本地人喜闻乐见的流行俚语和口语的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.librarySearchT: 从图书馆、数据池、其他资源中挖掘信息
CPR.global.itemType.skill.lipReadingTool: 观察嘴唇和嘴巴的动作，在没有听到的情况下解读语言
CPR.global.itemType.skill.localExpertToo: 对特定地区的了解：派别、政治、最棒的合成食品
CPR.global.itemType.skill.meleeWeaponToo: 近距离用东西打其他东西。
CPR.global.itemType.skill.paintOrDrawOrS: 创作有影响力的艺术作品的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.paramedicToolT: 如同急救，但可治疗更严重的伤情
CPR.global.itemType.skill.perceptionTool: 意识到周围发生的事情，发现蛛丝马迹，或注意到不合适的地方
CPR.global.itemType.skill.personalGroomi: 让身体形态更上一层楼，并在做这些事时获得最大收益。
CPR.global.itemType.skill.persuasionTool: 表现得足够真诚，以言语说服或影响他人
CPR.global.itemType.skill.persuasionAndT: 精灵神域技能。细节参见说服或交易技能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.photographyAnd: 使用照相机、录像机或超梦记录拍摄完美镜头的能力
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickLockToolTi: 在没有钥匙的情况下开启非电子锁的功能
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickLockAndPic: 精灵神域技能。细节参见开锁或扒窃技能。
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickPocketTool: 在不被发现的情况下从他人或商店搬运小东西
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pilotAirVehicl: 驾驶飞机、直升机、喷气机或其他飞行器
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pilotSeaVehicl: 操纵船只、快艇、油轮或其他浮船
CPR.global.itemType.skill.playInstrument: 不言自明吧，兄弟？演奏一种乐器
CPR.global.itemType.skill.resistTortureO: 在痛苦和不适来维持控制力的能力，无论是酷刑、药物还是审讯
CPR.global.itemType.skill.ridingToolTip: 与训练有素的活体动物一起运输
CPR.global.itemType.skill.scienceToolTip: 了解如何设计实验以准确检验假设、撰写相关论文并与学者交流
CPR.global.itemType.skill.shoulderArmsTo: 使用通常靠肩部支撑的武器时的准确性和精确度
CPR.global.itemType.skill.stealthToolTip: 在不被发现的情况下做某事或到达某地，通常是在非法侵入时
CPR.global.itemType.skill.streetwiseTool: 混迹在街上的智慧。 知道如何获得不应该获得的商品，然后滚蛋
CPR.global.itemType.skill.tacticsToolTip: 在战斗中有效调配资源，预测敌人的反应
CPR.global.itemType.skill.trackingToolTi: 根据线索或其他证据追踪事物的去向
CPR.global.itemType.skill.tradingToolTip: 能够辨别物品的价值，并在交易时获得更好的交易条件
CPR.global.itemType.skill.wardrobeAndSty: 知道如何搭配出完美的造型，并将其完美呈现。
CPR.global.itemType.skill.wildernessSurv: 了解如何在户外生存：觅食、避难、求生

CPR.global.stats.coolToolTip: 利用人格魅力影响他人并给他人留下深刻印象的能力
CPR.global.stats.dexToolTip: 平衡、协调运动能力和你的动觉
CPR.global.stats.empToolTip: 能够理解他人的困境并保持自己的人性
CPR.global.stats.intToolTip: 学习、归因、洞察、外推能力
CPR.global.stats.moveToolTip: 运动能力，你的跑步、跳跃、游泳等的速度
CPR.global.stats.refToolTip: 协调运动技能和反应时间的能力
CPR.global.stats.techToolTip: 使用工具和技术仪器的能力
CPR.global.stats.willToolTip: 承受压力和苦难的能力

CPR.messages.noValidAmmo: You have no ammo for that weapon, Choomba!
CPR.messages.notEnoughDrugs: You do not have anything left to consume, check that amount!
CPR.messages.reloadOutOfAmmo: Sorry, you're out of ammo, Choomba!
CPR.messages.rezBlackIceWithoutToken: You have attempted to REZ a Black ICE from a World Actor, however that actor has no token linked to it, therefore a Black ICE Actor/Token can not be created. The Black ICE Program is only shown as REZ'd in the Cyberdeck.  You can de-rez it, place an Actor Token and re-rez it from the Token Character Sheet to create the Black ICE Actor.
CPR.messages.tradeDragInWarn: You lack the permission to create items in this container. Have GM check container settings
CPR.messages.tradeDragInstalledCyberware: You can't trade installed Cyberware. Uninstall the cyberware and trade it from the Gear tab.
CPR.messages.tradeDragNotBuying: This vendor is not buying that item type.
CPR.messages.tradeDragOutWarn: This user is not allowed to drag an item out of a container actor.
CPR.messages.tradePriceWarn: You do not have enough Eurobucks. Do some Jobs, Choomba!
CPR.messages.tradeWithWarn: Please select a character, that should perform the trade first.
CPR.messages.tripleDigitStatMaxWarn: Your stat max is more than two digits causing formatting issues, only one digit may be shown.
CPR.messages.tripleDigitStatValueWarn: Your stat value is more than two digits causing formatting issues, only one digit may be shown.
CPR.messages.warnDeleteActiveRole: You deleted your active role. Active role now set to the following:

CPR.messages.warningNotEnoughEb: You lost more Eurobucks than you have!
CPR.messages.warningCannotModifyInstalle: You cannot modify installed items in compendium packs.
CPR.messages.warningNotEnoughIp: You lost more IP than you have!
CPR.messages.warningNotEnoughReputation: You lost more Reputation than you have!
CPR.messages.warningTokenNotSelectedForD: You must select your token before peforming any DV measurements with the ruler.
CPR.messages.warningTooManyHands: You are using more hands than you have!
CPR.messages.weaponAttackOutOfBullets: *CLICK* *CLICK*, you lack the bullets in your weapon to do that, Choomba!
CPR.messages.weaponDoesntSupportAltMode: That weapon doesn't support that Alt Fire Mode
CPR.messages.youCyberpsycho: Choom, you've gone too far! Cyberpsychosis has set in.
CPR.migration.status.migrationsFailed: Migrations failed! Check console for errors!
CPR.migration.status.waitForEnd: World Migration: Release notes will display when finished, please be patient
CPR.migration.warning.tooManyInstalledIt: WARNING: Actor {ActorName} ({ActorUuid}) owned item named '{ItemName}' ({ItemUuid}) has {InstallCount} items installed it in however, it only has {SlotCount} total slots.

CPR.netArchitecture.floor.deleteConfirma: the floor from the NET Architecture
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.done: The scene generation is done, you might have to leave to another scene and load this scene again if it does not display correctly.
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.floorForm: The name for the floor does not fit the desired format. Use a number followed directly by a small letter if desired, e.g. 4, 4a or 6c.
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.noFloorEr: The Items seems to not have any floors specified!
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.noGMError: Error: You do not have GM permissions. No Scene generation allowed!
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.noSceneEr: The custom Scene does not exist!
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.useRollta: Use Rolltables to populate the NET architecture
CPR.rolls.deathSave.title: 死亡豁免
CPR.rolls.defaultMods.wrongTools: 工具/部件与工作不匹配
CPR.rolls.modifiers.additionalModWarning: 额外调整值的字段只接受用逗号或空格分隔的数字。
CPR.rolls.noAutfireMaxConfig: 配置自动开火最高倍数！
CPR.settings.theme.title: Theme
CPR.settings.theme.hint: Select CSS Theme to use for the system
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.desc: Using your own compendia for system automations requires that they use specific naming and structure. Click the question marks to see the documentation.
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.hint: Choose compendia the system will use for various automations like critical injuries and generating net architectures.
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.name: Configure System Compendia
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.title: Configure System Compendia
CPR.settings.criticalInitiative.hint: When enabled, a critical initiative roll (good or bad) will roll and apply another die to the initiative roll
CPR.settings.criticalInitiative.name: Initiative rolls criticals
CPR.settings.criticalInjuryRollTableComp: Click for more information on creating homebrew critical injuries
Set the compendium of RollTables to inspect when rolling for a critical injury on character sheet.
CPR.settings.debugElements.hint: Show debugging elements in the UI, such as internal itemIDs
CPR.settings.debugElements.name: Debug Elements in UI
CPR.settings.debugLogs.hint: Enable debugging logs, filling them with useful info for system developers and testers.
CPR.settings.debugLogs.name: Debug Logs
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.hint: When enabled, deleting an item will prompt for confirmation
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.name: Delete item confirmation
CPR.settings.deleteContainer.hint: When deleting a item, should installed items also be deleted? If unchecked, they'll be uninstalled instead.
CPR.settings.deleteContainer.name: Delete Installed Items
CPR.settings.displayStatusAsActiveEffect: When enabled, token status will be displayed in the Active Effects tab of the character sheet
Display Token Status as an Effect
CPR.settings.dvRollTableCompendium.help: Click for more information on custom DV Tables
CPR.settings.dvRollTableCompendium.name: DV Tables
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.hint: Requires full reload to take effect (Ctrl+F5). Ignored if Foundry Photosensitivity mode is enabled.
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.name: Enable Pause Animation
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.hint: When enabled, roll dialogs are skipped by default and enabled when holding CTRL (or COMMAND for MacOS)
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.name: Invert function of CTRL (or COMMAND for MacOS) on Rolls
CPR.settings.migrateLockedCompendia.name: Migrate Locked Compendia
CPR.settings.migrateLockedCompendia.hint: Enabling this will migrate locked compendiums then re-lock them once migrations complete
CPR.settings.migrateModuleCompendia.name: Migrate Module Compendia
CPR.settings.migrateModuleCompendia.hint: Enabling this will migrate external (non world) Compendiums. Only enable this if you have external Modules providing Compendiums for the system.
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.hint: On the Mook sheet, choose how skills are displayed. You will need to re-open mook sheets for any change to take effect. Level = points in the skill only, Base = Level + Stat (this matches examples in the rule book), and Total = Level + Stat + Persistent Mods.
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.name: Mook Sheet Skill Display Options
Click for more information on creating net architectures with custom tables
Set the compendium used when generating a net architecture randomly
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.hint: When enabled, players can create items directly in their inventory
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.name: Players can create items
CPR.settings.preventDuplicateCriticalInj: Off = Allow duplicate Critical Injuries. Warn = Warn if duplicate Critical Injury is applied. Reroll = Reroll duplicate Critical Injuries.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.hint: Pin the system data model to a specific version. This will force or avoid data migrations and is VERY DANGEROUS. Only use this if you are tester or developer on the system module.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.name: System Data Model Version
CPR.settings.title: 设置
CPR.settings.traceLogs.hint: Enable trace logs. Turn this on when you are filing a bug or working with module developers on an issue.
CPR.settings.traceLogs.name: Trace Logs
CPR.settings.warnAboutNoTargetsWhenRolli: Uncheck to disable the warning about having no tokens targeted when rolling damage. Useful if you don't want to enforce using Foundry's targeting functionality.
CPR.system.message.toBeDeprecated: Usage of '{functionName}' will be deprecated in a future release.  See changelog for more details.
CPR.tooltip.isTooLargeForThisField: is too large for this field
CPR.tooltip.nameChangeWarning: Changing the name of CPR-Core Items (Roles & Role Abilities) may affect other translations within the game
